dct_title_s: Net-Zero America renewable energy candidate project areas for net-zero scenarios, 2050
dct_description_sm: This dataset shows candidate project areas (CPAs) for potential wind and solar development in the contiguous United States that will be required by 2050 for all net-zero-emissions scenarios under various land-use assumptions. For an overview of these land-use assumptions, please refer to the "supplemental information" portion of this record.
dct_creator_sm: Emily Leslie, Energy Reflections, LLC, Principal
Andrew Pascale, Andlinger Center, Princeton University, Post-Doctoral Research Associate
Jesse Jenkins, Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering Department and Andlinger Center, Princeton University, Assistant Professor
